sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Psychology, Memorial University of Newfoundland .

sentences.english: Oh, darling, refresh our memory. Our silver wedding anniversary is coming.
sentences.chinese: 噢，親愛的，回憶一下，我們的銀婚紀念日快到了。

sentences.english: You also can take some famous historcal building in the visiting item.

sentences.english: This was given us as a present on the occasion of our silver wedding.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們銀婚紀念時，收到的禮物。

sentences.english: To examine and approve the annual plans of commemorative and special stamps;

sentences.english: Her initials were enchased on the monument.

sentences.english: The central bank issued a commemorative 10-yuan bank note to mark the Beijing Olympic Games.

sentences.english: The central bank issued a commemorative 10-yuan bank note to mark the Beijing Olympic Games.

sentences.english: Xiao Wang gave his wife a bouquet of roses for their wedding anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 小王在結婚紀念日送給妻子一束玫瑰花。

sentences.english: The Company to undertake the design and production of various high-level commemorative gift table.

sentences.english: The building is a commemoration of the battle of Waterloo.

sentences.english: This gold-plated copper commemorative medallion has a diameter of 50mm.
sentences.chinese: 此枚紀念章爲銅質鍍金，直徑50毫米。

sentences.english: Lincoln's Birthday is commemorated every year in his hometown of Hodgenville.
sentences.chinese: 林肯紀念日每年都會在他的故鄉霍金維爾被慶祝。
